articles.title: Biden says U.S. to ban Russian flights from American airspace - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. government on Tuesday announced a ban on Russian flights from American airspace following similar moves by the European Union and Canada after Russia's invasion of neighboring Ukraine.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, March 1 (Reuters) - The U.S. government on Tuesday announced a ban on Russian flights from American airspace following similar moves by the European Union and Canada after Russia's invasi… [+2472 chars]

articles.description: US President Joe Biden will seek to unite Americans in solidarity with Ukraine in his speech while also focusing on his domestic economic agenda, including reintroducing elements of his stalled Build Back Better program

articles.title: Europe's joint Mars mission with Russia postponed by war - 1News
articles.description: While Europe has its own rockets to put satellites into orbit, it relies on Russian and American partners to send astronauts into space.
articles.content:
The launch of a joint Europe-Russia mission to Mars this year is now very unlikely due to sanctions linked to the war in Ukraine, the European Space Agency said on Tuesday.
